Oblivion Woods was never this dangerous before. Oh, sure, years ago, perhaps, but not in recent memory.

It's not just the devas, the earth spirits are aggressive and the dead walk once more. It must all be connected, I just can't prove it yet.

Would you go through Berzerad Cemetery and bring me spores from {@LinkCreature:3#2#Agitated Sporewalkers}? That would give me a place to start my research.
Excellent work. This couldn't have been easy. Let me just apply this reagent solution and...oh my.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What is it?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
